Donate

Every dollar helps us save animals.

We depend entirely on donations to provide for the
veterinary care that saves the lives of the
malnourished, seriously ingured, and sick wildlife.

Do you know how much it costs to
rehabilitate an animal?

  • $25
  • $50
  • $100
  • $500
  • Provides one month care for song birds
  • Takes care of a rabbit through release
  • Takes care of a squirrel through release
  • Takes care of a raptor through release
Become a Member

For just $1 per week, you can help
support the wildlife we assist.

Supporting membership, individual:

$52 per year

Supporting membership, family:

$75 per year

Lifetime membership:

$5000 per year

All members will receive a yearly membership card,
quarterly newsletters, discounts on t-shorts or other
merchandise, and a small gift as our way of saying thank
you.

Memberships can also be mailed to Friends of Texas
Wildlife, ...

Friends of Texas Wildlife

Friends of Texas Wildlife is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization; 100% of all donations support native Texas wildlife and are tax deductible to the extent permitted by law.
